## Plugin Submission

- **Plugin ID**:

### Checklist

Please ensure you have completed the following:

#### Required
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have tested my plugin with the latest ECS Editor
- [ ] My plugin does not contain malicious code
- [ ] My plugin repository is public on GitHub
- [ ] I have included a clear README in my plugin repository
- [ ] My plugin follows the [Plugin Development Guide](../docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md)
- [ ] The plugin is licensed under an open source license (MIT, Apache 2.0, etc.)

#### Code Quality
- [ ] My code does not use `eval()` or `Function()` constructor
- [ ] My code does not access the file system directly
- [ ] My code does not execute arbitrary commands
- [ ] My code follows best practices for security

#### Documentation
- [ ] I have included a description of what my plugin does
- [ ] I have included screenshots (if applicable)
- [ ] I have documented all configuration options
- [ ] I have included usage examples in my repository

**For Reviewers:**

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Code review completed
- [ ] Security check passed
- [ ] Functionality tested
- [ ] Documentation reviewed
- [ ] License verified
- [ ] No duplicate functionality with existing plugins
